header.title: I am a software engineer from France living in Stockholm where I work as React tutor and full time sustainability advocate.

aboutMe.title: Who am I
aboutMe.subtitle: French software engineer, hiker and sustainability advocate
aboutMe.body: Originally from Grenoble, near the French Alps, the mountains are part of my DNA and so does sustainability matters. As a software engineer, I pursue the goal of using my expertise to make the world a better place for all living beings. Providing better integration methods for refugees when coming to a new country, helping disabled people to use public transportation or simplifying access to bus and tramway schedules, all reveal the same trait:
aboutMe.highlight: I am driven by impactful roles
aboutMe.caption: In the mist - Vanoise, France

simpleTag.title: SimpleTag
simpleTag.subtitle: Get Grenoble's public transport live schedule on your Android
simpleTag.description: SimpleTag is an Android application that aims to simplify transportation within Grenoble and its area. It allows you to get live schedule for all transports on the SemiTag network - busses and tramways - in a easy and comprehensible way. More information is available on the Google Play Store page:

react-easy-panzoom.title: react-easy-panzoom
react-easy-panzoom.subtitle: React library for pan/zoom support for any kind of component
react-easy-panzoom.description: react-easy-panzoom is a React library to enable pan and zoom feature on any react component. This project is open source and can be found on Github:

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Personal portfolio designed and implemented from scratch using React and Material-UI
portfolio.description: This portfolio aims at showing who I am, my values and my projects. This single page application has been created from scratch using React, bootstrapped with create-react-app, deployed with gh-pages and uses Material-UI awesome component kit. All the code is open source and can be found on my Github:

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Want to grab a coffee and chat?
contact.body: If you are interested in my professional profile, want to discuss about sustainable development, French culture or just want to have a chat with some good coffee (or tea), you can contact me by email or on these platforms. If you are a company working with sustainable development and are in need of a fullstack engineer: wait no more and send an email!
